name: capture-mcp-server
description: Federal procurement and spending data capture
long_description: Capture MCP Server empowers users to capture and query federal entity, opportunity, and spending data through natural language queries. Works out-of-the-box with 4 USASpending.gov tools (no API keys needed). Optional SAM.gov API key adds 6 more tools. Optional Tango API key adds 5 additional tools. Full suite of 15 tools available with both keys.

tools.name: search_sam_entities
tools.description: Search for federal entities/businesses registered in SAM.gov

tools.name: get_sam_opportunities
tools.description: Fetch federal contract opportunities from SAM.gov

tools.name: get_sam_entity_details
tools.description: Get comprehensive details for a specific entity by UEI

tools.name: check_sam_exclusions
tools.description: Check if an entity is excluded from federal contracting

tools.name: get_usaspending_awards
tools.description: Get federal awards data for a specific agency

tools.name: get_usaspending_spending_by_category
tools.description: Get spending breakdown by award category

tools.name: get_usaspending_budgetary_resources
tools.description: Get budgetary resources and obligations for an agency

tools.name: search_usaspending_awards_by_recipient
tools.description: Search for federal awards by recipient name

tools.name: get_entity_and_awards
tools.description: Combine SAM entity data with USASpending award history

tools.name: get_opportunity_spending_context
tools.description: Link opportunities with historical spending context

tools.name: search_tango_contracts
tools.description: Search federal contracts through Tango's unified API

tools.name: search_tango_grants
tools.description: Search federal grants and financial assistance

tools.name: get_tango_vendor_profile
tools.description: Get comprehensive vendor profiles with history

tools.name: search_tango_opportunities
tools.description: Search federal contract opportunities with forecasts

SAM_GOV_API_KEY.title: SAM.gov API Key
SAM_GOV_API_KEY.description: Optional API key from sam.gov/data-services/API. Enables 6 additional tools: 4 SAM.gov tools (entities, opportunities, details, exclusions) + 2 Join tools (entity+awards, opportunity+context).

TANGO_API_KEY.title: Tango API Key
TANGO_API_KEY.description: Optional API key from tango.makegov.com. Enables 5 Tango tools: contracts, grants, vendor profiles, opportunities, and spending summaries.
